summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the purchase of an easement across a portion of Edward Hanford donation Claim No. 44 required in connection with the construction of Sewer Improvement Program Project 13, Neighborhood Improvement Program, Contract 4 (South College Street); providing for the acquisition of rights of entry to make sewer reconnections in certain designated areas and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund for the cost of such purchase and acquisitions including the expenses of the Engineering Department.
